content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":22904,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c1aa69cb-d5a5-460c-bd2c-0da40dbc9ae0/Screenshot 2022-10-05 at 14.36.55.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c1aa69cb-d5a5-460c-bd2c-0da40dbc9ae0/Screenshot 2022-10-05 at 14.36.55.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot 2022-10-05 at 14.36.55.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot 2022-10-05 at 14.36.55.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c1aa69cb-d5a5-460c-bd2c-0da40dbc9ae0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":901,\"height\":86.66606170598911},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://tripactions.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TripActions\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a travel management, corporate card and expense management company for businesses. Booking and managing travel and expenses must be done on the web or via a smartphone app. TripActions saves companies countless hours on everything from approvals to reconciliation to travel booking, all while enabling real-time control over spend. Smart virtual physical cards with build-in controls and unlimited cash back can be issues under request.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":648160,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/00cb546f-5c04-4df7-b7ee-e8d582b50318/Screenshot 2022-10-05 at 14.44.01.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/00cb546f-5c04-4df7-b7ee-e8d582b50318/Screenshot 2022-10-05 at 14.44.01.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot 2022-10-05 at 14.44.01.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot 2022-10-05 at 14.44.01.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"00cb546f-5c04-4df7-b7ee-e8d582b50318\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":901,\"height\":643.5714285714287},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Services\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"18.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All functionality including administrative travel management can be done through the desktop and mobile application. Users have the ability to book trips, file receipts, modify reservations, track travel itineraries, chat with travel support agents, receive real-time notifications, and reconcile expenses\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#202122\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#202122\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TripActions partners with multiple suppliers in the market to provide users with a wide array of travel selection. Inventory on the platform comes from consumer, corporate, and direct integrations\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#202122\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#202122\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-spacerun\":\"yes\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"18.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TripActions Liquid\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#202122\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" provides companies and employees with a suite of tools to manage and track spend. With physical and virtual cards, smart approval workflows, automated expense reports and centralized billing, the technology is positioned as a modern alternative to legacy payment and expense systems.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#202122\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The platform uses artificial intelligence and machine learning to optimize search results, inventory and the support experience. Results are prioritized using the company's policies, real-time market prices and individual employee preferences including loyalty\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#202122\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"program memberships.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"10.5pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"\\\"Times New Roman\\\"\",\"color\":\"#202122\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-GB\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TripActions#cite_note-29\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The system's admin dashboard tracks company spend, potential savings, and employees' travel and spend patterns. In accordance with duty of care, the admin dashboard features a live map that shows where employees are traveling in real time. Finance and travel teams can contact travelers directly within the application in emergency
